name: Realm of the Fallen
summary: VR meets old school FPS. Assume the role of a resurrected warrior in another dimension where a once-flourishing civilization was eradicated by a sinister interdimensional being. Remaining is a temple that has been overrun by augmented undead minions. Blast, bludgeon, jump, and climb your way through multiple levels. Combines the best elements of VR and classic shooters. Use bullets, rockets, lasers, grenades, and punches to eradicate your foes. Search the temple for the being responsible for the...
